name: Cooking Rush
description:
In Cooking Rush, you play a cook in a restaurant and you have to serve the most customers you can in 5 in-game days. Make hamburgers, cheeseburgers, sodas, slush, salads and fries. Go quick before the customers decide to head out! A game requiring fast actions and fast thinking. But it doesn't stop there, if it did, it would'n fit the occult theme of this gamejam. I'll let you figure out by your own what the game has to offer.

CREDITS:
